name: Dog & Fox Ruins
description:
A desert where you jump over fox and dog ruins. Nothing more. Based on UFPS (Unity plugin). Made in (more or less) ONE HOUR with Unity3D

Low Poly Animals by Pixel Man

_ _ _ _ _ _ _

Made for the Weekly Hour Game Jam
https://itch.io/jam/weekly-hour-game-jam---w2-2017

Theme : The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
